0.4.3.name: wordpress/td-word-count
0.4.3.description: With the TD Word Count plugin bloggers can sort through and view both total published and unpublished posts sortable by most words, least words, title alphabetically, date (oldest to newest and newest to oldest). It also lists published posts by author. All stats are displayed in the WP dashboard area under the word count tab.
